name: Corazon Heart
tagline: Corazon is an open-source C# library which aims to make your development life easier. It includes libraries to customize your website language, integer obfuscation, cryptography and more.
body:
### Welcome to Corazon Heart
An open source C# library intended to make your development life easier. From customizing your website language, cryptography, obfuscation and compression, it's in the package. It is still under heavy development though. To clone the Git repository, run the following commands:

```
$ cd kendtimothy/corazon-heart
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Open for the World - and You
The codes are open for anyone to use - commercially or non-commercially. If you want to develop this together with me, please let me know. See Contact section below. Any contribution or feedback is highly encouraged.

### Authors and Contributors
Corazon Heart is originally written by Ken D Timothy (@kendtimothy).

### Contact
You can contact me at kennydanani@gmail.com and weâ€™ll see what we can develop together.
